Php Coding Contest

27 Jan 2004

Codewalkers.com has released their latest PHP Coding Contest. This time around you are challenged to write a program to play the game of black jack. Several rule variations can take place in each game such as allowing splits, doubling, etc.

A host of prizes are available to the top placers. For more info see http://codewalkers.com/php-contest.php.
